p: Results: 92 subjects were studied (ICU- 54 and C-38). CD64 Index levels were higher (mean ± SEM) in ICU definite and probable infection patients than ICU no infection and normal control patients (Definite Infection 2.24 ± 0.48, Probable Infection 1.54 ± 0.7, Possible Infection 0.57 ± 0.37, No Infection 0.65 ± 0.17, Healthy 0.53 ± 0.02). Results can be seen in Fig. 5.
